title: How do I get my alarm to vibrate when my phone (Pixel 4XL) is in vibrate mode?
content: I used to be able to put my phone on vibrate and the alarm would automatically vibrate.  Now when my phone is on vibrate the alarm will still sound.  I can not find the setting that allows the phone vibrate to override the alarm sound.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
